UnitDescr: Add 2d6 to your combat total on an atack you initiate. Play after all defensive cards have been played. The attacking unit is reduced at the end of the combat.
Any one unit you moved this turn may move one additional space

Place a Redoubt marker under  a unit. That unit adds 3 to its defense total. Only 1 Redoubt may be played per turn.

Negates any Redoubt being used in the current combat. Play after all defensive cards hve been played.

Play after all defensive cards have been played. Move the attacking unit up to 2 spaces in any direction or combination of directions. Return the combat card you used to initiate the combat to your hand.
Look at your opponent's hand. Playable any time during your turn.
You may use this card to do one of the following: 1. Move one additional unit in the movement phase. 2. Restore a reduced unit.
